description: The implementation of a Code Integrity Policy (CIP) to restrict execution of the vulnerable curl executable ensures that only non-vulnerable versions are permitted to run on Windows devices. This policy can be created or merged using PowerShell cmdlets and helps mitigate the risks associated with the CVE-2023-38039 vulnerability. System administrators can deploy this policy through various means, including Windows Defender Application Control (WDAC), Intune, Configuration Manager, or Group Policy.
